pageContext.claim: “We're testing more people than anyone -- any country in the world by far -- by double, by much more than double. More than everybody else in combined, we're testing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump’s bravado is ridiculously wrong. The rest of the world combined had conducted about five times more tests. As we have repeatedly noted, what matters is the number of tests per million people. The per-million testing rate in April and May for the United States was the lowest of the top six countries that had the most tests.
